game.name: City Fire Truck Rescue
game.description:
Not everyone dares to live for others! Today you will get a chance here to save the lives of some civilians who are stuck by the unwanted fire. All people of your city has now got into a big trouble and you are the only one who knows how to drive a fire truck. So grab your seat in your chosen truck and get ready to play the role of a nice fire fighter in City Fire Truck Rescue. Do not bother as your vehicle is lashed with all the equipment you need to handle the situation.

Turn on the sirens of your chosen lovely firefighter truck before rushing down to the road in this brand new racing game! Be fast and try to drive your vehicle at a good speed to rescue the helpful civilians in this one of the highly addictive and commonly played firefighting simulator! Make sure to reach the fire zone timely to extinguish fire before any wrong happens. Do not take it easily and try to fight down the fire till the last spark exists using the rescue truck.

Playing the role of a fireman is going to be the best thing you have ever done online in this HTML5 fire truck game! There are multiple rescue missions to play through so do not waste your time anymore. However, always try to reach to the affected area until you could not receive an emergency call. Common boys! Today you have got a chance to be the best city traffic racer and a wonderful hero who loves saving lives of human beings. Good luck to reach the destination fast to complete the rescue missions and earn points! Use those points to unlock new truck models in this one of the best rescue games!
